subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The teams agreed to terms on a deal that will send A. J. Burnett to Pittsburgh for two minor leaguers, and the Pirates will also pick up $13 million of Burnett’s remaining salary.
snippet: The teams agreed to terms on a deal that will send A. J. Burnett to Pittsburgh for two minor leaguers, and the Pirates will also pick up $13 million of Burnett’s remaining salary.
